Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Racine
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity.  Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Racine due to police activity. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#7 Harrison

#126 Jackson

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through LaSalle to Forest Park.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue line Trains bypassing Racine
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Racine due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but not stopping at Racine due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
